text: Lu Yang (; born 3 March 1991) is a Chinese footballer who currently plays for Chengdu Better City in the China League One. ==Club career== Lu Yang started his professional football career in 2011 when he joined Tianjin Teda for the 2011 Chinese Super League campaign.2011赛季中超联赛天津康师傅队球员名单 at sports.sina.com 2011-03-28. Retrieved 2018-02-15 In March 2012, he transferred to China League Two side Hebei Zhongji.河北中基男足全力冲甲 at sports.sohu.com 2012-03-21 Retrieved 2018-02-15 On 29 July 2017, he made his debut for Hebei in the 2017 Chinese Super League against Shanghai Shenhua, coming on as a substitute for Luo Senwen in the 46th minute.中超-莫雷诺2球马丁斯建功 申花3-2大逆转擒华夏 at sports.sohu.com 2017-07-29. Retrieved 2018-02-15 He was sent to the Hebei China Fortune reserved team in 2018. On 27 February 2019, Lu transferred to League Two newcomer Chengdu Better City.中乙新军成都兴城签三员猛将 刘宇回家河北多面手来投 at qq.com 2019-02-27.
